column1: Bridges in the United Kingdom is a link page for any road bridges or footbridges in the United Kingdom.
Railway bridges are listed under: List of railway bridges and viaducts in the United Kingdom.
Canal aqueducts are listed under: List of canal aqueducts in the United Kingdom
All bridges are over the River Clyde unless otherwise specified.
